@BBCCountryfile I’m just watching tonight’s episode and being
appalled by the scaremongering being touted here. Yes the price of
fertiliser and oil may be rising so start thinking outside of the
box. Maybe use manure for a start...?? Fertiliser is bad for the
planet anyway!
Fertiliser and animal feed cost has gone through the roof. In
certain cases, like urea, the price has quintupled with very
prolonged lead times. They are systematically driving up the cost
of staple crops - wheat, corn, soybean, potatoes. It
